      static int checkBanks()
      Checking the status of the game if the cabbage/sheep or wolf/sheep are on the same side w/o the human: user loses

      static boolean errorChecking(java.lang.String move)
      Error checking method to make sure that the item must travel with a human
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      This is a main method calling welcome, displayGame, running a loop out of the game Continues until user wins or user messes up
      static void moveThings(java.lang.String userChoice)
      Moves the objects from one bank to the other based on the user's choice Toggles the cabb/human/wolf/sheep between true and false to flip between the banks The banks have no specific assigned value of true/false then

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This is a main method calling welcome, displayGame, running a loop out of the game Continues until user wins or user messes up
        Parameters:

      • welcome

        public static void welcome()
        Welcoming user to the farmer's game

      • displayGame

        public static void displayGame()
        Displaying the game each time after the user chooses to move something

      • errorChecking

        public static boolean errorChecking(java.lang.String move)
        Error checking method to make sure that the item must travel with a human
        Parameters:
        move - String that holds user's guess/choice
        Returns:
        whether the next move is valid

      • moveThings

        public static void moveThings(java.lang.String userChoice)
        Moves the objects from one bank to the other based on the user's choice Toggles the cabb/human/wolf/sheep between true and false to flip between the banks The banks have no specific assigned value of true/false then
        Parameters:
        userChoice - what the user picks to move

      • checkBanks

        public static int checkBanks()
        Checking the status of the game if the cabbage/sheep or wolf/sheep are on the same side w/o the human: user loses
        Returns:
        status of the game user loses (0) continues (1) wins (2)
